member.name: T:Microsoft.Fast.Components.FluentUI.FluentSystemIcon
member.summary: FluentSystemIcon is a component that renders an icon from the Fluent System icon set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Fast.Components.FluentUI.FluentSystemIcon.Icon
member.summary: Icon to be used can either be svg paths.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Fast.Components.FluentUI.FluentSystemIcon.Slot
member.summary: Gets or sets the slot where the icon is displayed in

member.name: P:Microsoft.Fast.Components.FluentUI.FluentSystemIcon.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title for the icon

member.name: P:Microsoft.Fast.Components.FluentUI.FluentSystemIcon.Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the icon drawing and fill color. Value comes from the enumeration. Defaults to Accent.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Fast.Components.FluentUI.FluentSystemIcon.CustomColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the icon drawing and fill color to a custom value. Needs to be formatted as an HTML hex color string (#rrggbb or #rgb) or CSS variable. ⚠️ Only available when Color is set to Color.Custom.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Fast.Components.FluentUI.FluentSystemIcon.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the icon size, used to create the viewbox, width and height attributes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Fast.Components.FluentUI.FluentSystemIcon.OnClick
member.summary: Allows for capturing a mouse click on an icon

member.name: M:Microsoft.Fast.Components.FluentUI.FluentSystemIcon.IsSvgIcon
member.summary: Returns true if the icon contains a SVG content.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Fast.Components.FluentUI.Icon.#ctor(System.String,Microsoft.Fast.Components.FluentUI.IconVariant,Microsoft.Fast.Components.FluentUI.IconSize,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Fast.Components.FluentUI.Icon.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the icon: AddCircle, Accessibility, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Fast.Components.FluentUI.Icon.Size
member.summary: Gets the size of the icon: 20, 24, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Fast.Components.FluentUI.Icon.Variant
member.summary: Gets the variant of the icon: Filled, Regular.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Fast.Components.FluentUI.Icon.Content
member.summary: Gets the content of the icon: SVG path.
